channel.title: Pages on Benjamin Weis
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Benjamin Weis

item.title: about
item.description: I’m a 21-year-old programmer currently living in San Francisco. I’m a student at Purdue University where will receive my Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science with a focus in Software Engineering. When I’m not writing softeare, I enjoy volunteering with FIRST Robotics teams teaching high school students how to program and how to attack design problems simply and effectively. For a closer look at the professional work I’ve done, check out my resume.
